ReportSection.title: Six Month Follow Up: Behavioural Self-Assessment
ReportSection.Static:
<script type="text/javascript">
                    function checkVaccination(){
                        var shinglesVaccination = '{getText(RP_AVOID,behaviouralassess,vaccinate3_avoid,0,{$user_id},0)}';
                        var pneumoniaVaccination = '{getText(RP_AVOID,behaviouralassess,vaccinate4_avoid,0,{$user_id},0)}';
                        var shinglesVaccination2 = '{getText(RP_AVOID_THREEMO,behaviouralassess,vaccinate3_avoid,0,{$user_id},0)}';
                        var pneumoniaVaccination2 = '{getText(RP_AVOID_THREEMO,behaviouralassess,vaccinate4_avoid,0,{$user_id},0)}';
                        if(shinglesVaccination == 'Yes' || shinglesVaccination2 == 'Yes'){
                            $('input[type="radio"][name="SelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid"]').val("Yes");
                            $('input[type="hidden"][name="SelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid"]').val("Yes");
                            $('span#vaccinate3_avoid').hide();
                            $('span#vaccinate3specify').hide();

                        }
                        if(pneumoniaVaccination == 'Yes' || pneumoniaVaccination2 == 'Yes'){
                            $('input[type="radio"][name="SelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid"]').val("Yes");
                            $('input[type="hidden"][name="SelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid"]').val("Yes");
                            $('span#vaccinate4_avoid').hide();
                            $('span#vaccinate4specify').hide();
                        }
                        saveAll();
                    }
                    $(document).ready(function(){
                        checkVaccination();
                    });
                </script>
